comment._content: I thought Sam Hood died in 1953? acms.sl.nsw.gov.au/item/itemdetailpaged.aspx?itemid=395018

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content: Good point Beachcomber. It's from the Hood collection - obviously not actually taken by Sam. I've amended the thoughtless attribution above!
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection

comment.author: 32162360@N00

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content: The State Libvrary also holds the collection of Ted Hood, Sam Hood's son, and in this case the photographer would probably be Ted Hood, assuming the date is correct (and it is not always possible to know this with many photographic collections)
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection
